trans-unit.source: Emitted when a directory is selected.
trans-unit.target: 选择目录时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a file is selected.
trans-unit.target: 选择文件时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a joypad device has been connected or disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 当joypad设备被连接或断开时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a modal Control is closed. See show_modal.
trans-unit.target: 当模式 Control 关闭时发出。参见show_modal。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a new client connects. “protocol” will be the sub-protocol agreed with the client.
trans-unit.target: 当新客户端连接时发出。“协议”将是与客户达成的子协议。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a new message is received. Note: This signal is NOT emitted when used as high level multiplayer peer.
trans-unit.target: 收到新消息时发出。注意:当作为高级多人对等时,此信号不会发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a node’s configuration changed. Only emitted in tool mode.
trans-unit.target: 当节点的配置更改时发出。仅在工具模式下发射。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a packet is received from a peer. Note: this signal is only emitted when the client or server is configured to use Godot multiplayer API.
trans-unit.target: 当收到来自对等体的数据包时发出。注意:只有当客户端或服务器被配置为使用Godot多人API时,才会发出此信号。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a preset is added.
trans-unit.target: 添加预设时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a preset is removed.
trans-unit.target: 移除预设时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a tab is selected, even if it is the current tab.
trans-unit.target: 当选择一个标签页时,即使是当前标签页,也会发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a tilemap setting has changed.
trans-unit.target: 平铺图设置改变时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a tween ends.
trans-unit.target: 当一个tween结束时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a tween starts.
trans-unit.target: 当Tween开始时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when all processes in a tween end.
trans-unit.target: 当一个ween的所有进程结束时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an input event occurs. Requires input_pickable to be true and at least one collision_layer bit to be set. See _input_event for details.
trans-unit.target: 在发生输入事件时发出。要求input_pickable为 true 并至少设置一个 collision_layer 位。有关详细信息，请参见_input_event。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an item is collapsed by a click on the folding arrow.
trans-unit.target: 点击折叠箭头使物品折叠时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an item is edited using the right mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 使用鼠标右键编辑项目时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an item is edited.
trans-unit.target: 编辑项目时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an item is selected with the right mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 用鼠标右键选择项目时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 选择项目时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an item’s icon is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 双击项目的图标时发射。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an item’s label is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 双击项目的标签时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when another area enters, reporting which areas overlapped.
trans-unit.target: 当另一个区域进入时发出,报告哪些区域重叠。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when another area enters, reporting which shapes overlapped.
trans-unit.target: 当另一个区域进入时发出,报告哪些形状重叠。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when another area enters.
trans-unit.target: 当另一个区域进入时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when another area exits, reporting which areas were overlapping.
trans-unit.target: 当另一个区域退出时发出,报告哪些区域是重叠的。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when another area exits, reporting which shapes were overlapping.
trans-unit.target: 当另一个区域退出时发出,报告哪些形状是重叠的。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when another area exits.
trans-unit.target: 当另一个区域退出时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when becoming hidden.
trans-unit.target: 变得隐蔽时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when editor is about to close the active script. Argument is a Script that is going to be closed.
trans-unit.target: 当编辑器即将关闭活动脚本时发出。参数是一个将要关闭的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when files are dragged from the OS file manager and dropped in the game window. The arguments are a list of file paths and the identifier of the screen where the drag originated.
trans-unit.target: 从操作系统文件管理器中拖动文件到游戏窗口时发出。参数为文件路径列表和拖动的屏幕标识符。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when multiple files are selected.
trans-unit.target: 选择多个文件时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when node visibility changes.
trans-unit.target: 节点可见性改变时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when one of the size flags changes. See size_flags_horizontal and size_flags_vertical.
trans-unit.target: 当大小标志之一更改时发出。参见size_flags_horizo​​ntal和size_flags_vertical。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when playback is finished.
trans-unit.target: 回放结束时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when sorting the children is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要对孩子进行分类时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when switching to another tab.
trans-unit.target: 切换到另一个标签时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the curve changes.
trans-unit.target: 曲线更改时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the frame changes.
trans-unit.target: 框架改变时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the texture changes.
trans-unit.target: 当纹理改变时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the frame changes.
trans-unit.target: 框架改变时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the AudioBusLayout changes.
trans-unit.target: 当AudioBusLayout更改时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the TabContainer’s Popup button is clicked. See set_popup for details.
trans-unit.target: 单击 TabContainer 的 “ 弹出”按钮时发出。有关详细信息，请参见set_popup。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the CanvasItem must redraw. This can only be connected realtime, as deferred will not allow drawing.
trans-unit.target: 当CanvasItem必须重绘时发出。这只能是实时连接,因为延迟将不允许绘制。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the VisibilityNotifier enters a Camera’s view.
trans-unit.target: 当VisibilityNotifier进入相机的视图时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the VisibilityNotifier enters the screen.
trans-unit.target: VisibilityNotifier进入画面时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the VisibilityNotifier exits a Camera’s view.
trans-unit.target: 当VisibilityNotifier退出相机的视图时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the VisibilityNotifier exits the screen.
trans-unit.target: VisibilityNotifier退出屏幕时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the VisibilityNotifier2D enters a Viewport’s view.
trans-unit.target: 当VisibilityNotifier2D进入视口的视图时触发。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the VisibilityNotifier2D enters the screen.
trans-unit.target: VisibilityNotifier2D进入屏幕时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the VisibilityNotifier2D exits a Viewport’s view.
trans-unit.target: 当VisibilityNotifier2D退出视口的视图时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the VisibilityNotifier2D exits the screen.
trans-unit.target: 当VisibilityNotifier2D退出屏幕时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the animation is finished (when it plays the last frame). If the animation is looping, this signal is emitted every time the last frame is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 当动画完成时(播放最后一帧时)发出。如果动画是循环播放的,则每次绘制最后一帧时发出此信号。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the audio stops playing.
trans-unit.target: 音频停止播放时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the available input/output ports are changed.
trans-unit.target: 当可用输入/输出端口发生变化时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the body changes its sleeping state. Either by sleeping or waking up.
trans-unit.target: 当身体改变睡眠状态时发出的。无论是睡觉还是醒来。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the button is pressed (down).
trans-unit.target: 按钮被按下(向下)时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the button is released (up).
trans-unit.target: 松开按钮(向上)时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the button starts being held down.
trans-unit.target: 当按钮开始被按住时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the button stops being held down.
trans-unit.target: 当按钮停止被按住时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the color changes.
trans-unit.target: 颜色变化时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the color is changed.
trans-unit.target: 换色时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the connection to the server fails.
trans-unit.target: 连接服务器失败时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the connection to the server is closed. was_clean_close will be true if the connection was shutdown cleanly.
trans-unit.target: 在关闭与服务器的连接时发出。如果干净地关闭了连接， was_clean_close 将为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the control changes size.
trans-unit.target: 控件尺寸变化时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the cursor changes.
trans-unit.target: 光标变化时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the dialog is accepted, i.e. the OK button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 当对话框被接受,即按下 "确定 "按钮时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the dragger is dragged by user.
trans-unit.target: 用户拖动拖动器时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the item rect has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当项目的矩形发生变化时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the mouse enters the control’s Rect area, provided its mouse_filter lets the event reach it.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标进入控件的 Rect 区域时触发，前提是其mouse_filter允许事件到达该控件。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the mouse leaves the control’s Rect area, provided its mouse_filter lets the event reach it.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标离开控件的 Rect 区域时触发，前提是其mouse_filter允许事件到达该控件。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the mouse pointer enters any of this object’s shapes.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针进入该对象的任何形状时触发。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the mouse pointer enters any of this object’s shapes. Requires input_pickable to be true and at least one collision_layer bit to be set.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针进入该对象的任何形状时触发。要求input_pickable为 true 并至少设置一个 collision_layer 位。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the mouse pointer exits all this object’s shapes.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针退出该对象的所有形状时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the mouse pointer exits all this object’s shapes. Requires input_pickable to be true and at least one collision_layer bit to be set.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针退出该对象的所有形状时发出。要求input_pickable为 true 并至少设置一个 collision_layer 位。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the node enters the tree.
trans-unit.target: 节点进入树时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the node gains keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 当节点获得键盘焦点时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the node is ready.
trans-unit.target: 节点准备好后发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the node is renamed.
trans-unit.target: 节点重命名时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the node is still active but about to exit the tree. This is the right place for de-initialization (or a “destructor”, if you will).
trans-unit.target: 在节点仍处于活动状态但即将退出树时发出。这是进行反初始化的正确位置（如果需要，也可以使用“析构函数”）。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the node loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 当节点失去键盘焦点时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the node receives an InputEvent.
trans-unit.target: 在节点收到InputEvent时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the node’s minimum size changes.
trans-unit.target: 当节点的最小大小更改时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the ports of a node are changed.
trans-unit.target: 节点的端口发生变化时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the right mouse button is pressed if RMB selection is active and the tree is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果人民币选择处于活动状态,且树为空,则按下鼠标右键时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the scene is changed in the editor. The argument will return the root node of the scene that has just become active. If this scene is new and empty, the argument will be null.
trans-unit.target: 在编辑器中改变场景时发出。该参数将返回刚刚成为活动场景的根节点。如果这个场景是新的,而且是空的,参数将为空。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the selection changes.
trans-unit.target: 更改选择时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the server requests a clean close. You should keep polling until you get a connection_closed signal to achieve the clean close. See WebSocketPeer.close for more details.
trans-unit.target: 服务器请求干净关闭时发出。您应该继续轮询，直到获得connection_closed信号以实现干净关闭为止。有关更多详细信息，请参见WebSocketPeer.close。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the size of the viewport is changed, whether by set_size_override, resize of window, or some other means.
trans-unit.target: 更改视口大小时发出的信号，无论是通过set_size_override，调整窗口大小还是通过其他方式更改。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the text changes.
trans-unit.target: 文本变化时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the timer reaches 0.
trans-unit.target: 计时器达到0时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the user clicks the OK button.
trans-unit.target: 当用户点击 "确定 "按钮时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the user presses KEY_ENTER on the LineEdit.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在 KEY_ENTER 上按下KEY_ENTER时 LineEdit 。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the visibility (hidden/visible) changes.
trans-unit.target: 当可见性(隐藏/可见)发生变化时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when user changed active script. Argument is a freshly activated Script.
trans-unit.target: 用户更改活动脚本时发出。参数是一个新激活的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when user changes the workspace (2D, 3D, Script, AssetLib). Also works with custom screens defined by plugins.
trans-unit.target: 当用户改变工作空间(2D、3D、脚本、AssetLib)时发出。也适用于由插件定义的自定义屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when user closes a scene. The argument is file path to a closed scene.
trans-unit.target: 当用户关闭场景时发出。参数是关闭场景的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever a node is added to the SceneTree.
trans-unit.target: 每当将节点添加到 SceneTree 时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever a node is removed from the SceneTree.
trans-unit.target: 每当从 SceneTree 中移除节点时就发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever scrolling is started.
trans-unit.target: 每当开始滚动时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever scrolling stops.
trans-unit.target: 每当滚动停止时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever the SceneTree hierarchy changed (children being moved or renamed, etc.).
trans-unit.target: 每当 SceneTree 层次结构发生更改（移动或重命名子项等）时，都会发出此事件。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever the object’s script is changed.
trans-unit.target: 每当对象的脚本更改时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever the resource changes.
trans-unit.target: 每当资源发生变化时就会发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever the screen resolution (fullscreen) or window size (windowed) changes.
trans-unit.target: 每当屏幕分辨率(全屏)或窗口大小(窗口化)发生变化时就会发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever the scrollbar is being scrolled.
trans-unit.target: 每当滚动条被滚动时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever this SceneTree’s network_peer connects with a new peer. ID is the peer ID of the new peer. Clients get notified when other clients connect to the same server. Upon connecting to a server, a client also receives this signal for the server (with ID being 1).
trans-unit.target: 每当此 SceneTree 的network_peer与新的对等方连接时发出。ID是新对等方的对等方ID。当其他客户端连接到同一服务器时，客户端会收到通知。连接到服务器后，客户端还将收到该服务器的信号（ID为1）。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever this SceneTree’s network_peer disconnected from server. Only emitted on clients.
trans-unit.target: 每当此 SceneTree 的network_peer与服务器断开连接时发出。仅在客户端上发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever this SceneTree’s network_peer disconnects from a peer. Clients get notified when other clients disconnect from the same server.
trans-unit.target: 每当此 SceneTree 的network_peer与对等方断开连接时发出。当其他客户端与同一服务器断开连接时，客户端会收到通知。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever this SceneTree’s network_peer fails to establish a connection to a server. Only emitted on clients.
trans-unit.target: 每当此 SceneTree 的network_peer无法建立与服务器的连接时发出。仅在客户端上发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever this SceneTree’s network_peer successfully connected to a server. Only emitted on clients.
trans-unit.target: 每当此 SceneTree 的network_peer成功连接到服务器时发出。仅在客户端上发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever this MultiplayerAPI’s network_peer connects with a new peer. ID is the peer ID of the new peer. Clients get notified when other clients connect to the same server. Upon connecting to a server, a client also receives this signal for the server (with ID being 1).
trans-unit.target: 每当此MultiplayerAPI的network_peer与新的对等方连接时发出。ID是新对等方的对等方ID。当其他客户端连接到同一服务器时，客户端会收到通知。连接到服务器后，客户端还将收到该服务器的信号（ID为1）。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever this MultiplayerAPI’s network_peer disconnects from a peer. Clients get notified when other clients disconnect from the same server.
trans-unit.target: 每当此MultiplayerAPI的network_peer与对等方断开连接时发出。当其他客户端与同一服务器断开连接时，客户端会收到通知。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever this MultiplayerAPI’s network_peer disconnects from server. Only emitted on clients.
trans-unit.target: 每当此MultiplayerAPI的network_peer与服务器断开连接时发出。仅在客户端上发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever this MultiplayerAPI’s network_peer fails to establish a connection to a server. Only emitted on clients.
trans-unit.target: 每当此MultiplayerAPI的network_peer无法建立与服务器的连接时发出。仅在客户端上发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever this MultiplayerAPI’s network_peer receive a packet with custom data (see send_bytes). ID is the peer ID of the peer that sent the packet.
trans-unit.target: 每当此MultiplayerAPI的network_peer接收到包含自定义数据的数据 packet 时发出（请参见send_bytes）。ID是发送数据包的对等方的对等方ID。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever this MultiplayerAPI’s network_peer successfully connected to a server. Only emitted on clients.
trans-unit.target: 每当此MultiplayerAPI的network_peer成功连接到服务器时发出。仅在客户端上发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitter will emit amount divided by trail_divisor particles. The remaining particles will be used as trail(s).
trans-unit.target: 发射器将发射的 amount 除以 trail_divisor 粒子。其余的粒子将用作线索。

trans-unit.source: Empty stylebox (does not display anything).
trans-unit.target: 空的样式框(不显示任何内容)。

trans-unit.source: Empty stylebox (really does not display anything).
trans-unit.target: 空的样式框(真的不显示任何东西)。

trans-unit.source: Enable certain nodes only when visible.
trans-unit.target: 只在可见时启用某些节点。

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable SSL certificate verification. Note: You must specify the certificates to be used in the project settings for it to work when exported.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用SSL证书验证。注意:必须在项目设置中指定要使用的证书,才能在导出时发挥作用。

trans-unit.source: Enables backup saves if enabled is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果 enabled 为 true ,则启用备份保存。

trans-unit.source: Enables fog’s light transmission. If enabled, lets reflections light to be transmitted by the fog.
trans-unit.target: 启用雾的透光。如果启用，则使反射光被雾透射。

trans-unit.source: Enables glow rendering.
trans-unit.target: 启用辉光渲染。

trans-unit.source: Enables long-distance matching in Zstandard.
trans-unit.target: 在Zstandard中启用远距离匹配。

trans-unit.source: Enables one way collision on body if enable is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果 enable 为 true ,则在主体上启用单向碰撞。

trans-unit.source: Enables one-way collision on a tile’s shape.
trans-unit.target: 在图块的形状上启用单向碰撞。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disabled internal processing for this node. Internal processing happens in isolation from the normal _process calls and is used by some nodes internally to guarantee proper functioning even if the node is paused or processing is disabled for scripting (set_process). Only useful for advanced uses to manipulate built-in nodes behavior.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用此节点的内部处理。内部处理独立于正常的_process调用进行，并且某些节点在内部使用该内部处理来保证正常运行，即使该节点已暂停或已禁用脚本处理（set_process）。仅对操纵内置节点行为的高级用途有用。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables a canvas light.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用画布灯。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables input processing. This is not required for GUI controls! Enabled automatically if _input is overridden. Any calls to this before _ready will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用输入处理。GUI控件不需要此功能！如果_input被覆盖，则自动启用。_ready之前对此的任何调用都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables internal physics for this node. Internal physics processing happens in isolation from the normal _physics_process calls and is used by some nodes internally to guarantee proper functioning even if the node is paused or physics processing is disabled for scripting (set_physics_process). Only useful for advanced uses to manipulate built-in nodes behavior.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用此节点的内部物理。内部物理处理独立于常规_physics_process调用而进行，并且即使节点暂停或为脚本禁用了物理处理（set_physics_process），某些内部节点也使用内部物理处理来保证其正常运行。仅对操纵内置节点行为的高级用途有用。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables light occluder.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用光遮蔽器。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables physics (i.e. fixed framerate) processing. When a node is being processed, it will receive a NOTIFICATION_PHYSICS_PROCESS at a fixed (usually 60 FPS, see Engine.target_fps to change) interval (and the _physics_process callback will be called if exists). Enabled automatically if _physics_process is overridden. Any calls to this before _ready will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用物理（即固定帧频）处理。处理节点时，它将以固定的时间间隔（通常为60 FPS，请参阅Engine.target_fps进行更改）接收到NOTIFICATION_PHYSICS_PROCESS（如果存在，则将调用_physics_process回调）。如果_physics_process被覆盖，则自动启用。_ready之前对此的任何调用都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables processing. When a node is being processed, it will receive a NOTIFICATION_PROCESS on every drawn frame (and the _process callback will be called if exists). Enabled automatically if _process is overridden. Any calls to this before _ready will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用处理。处理节点时，它将在每个绘制的帧上收到NOTIFICATION_PROCESS（如果存在_process回调将被调用）。如果_process被覆盖，则自动启用。_ready之前对此的任何调用都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the canvas light’s shadow.

trans-unit.source: Finds a descendant of this node whose name matches mask as in String.match (i.e. case sensitive, but ‘*’ matches zero or more characters and ‘?’ matches any single character except ‘.’). Note that it does not match against the full path, just against individual node names.
trans-unit.target: 查找其名称匹配此节点的后代 mask 作为String.match（即区分大小写，但“*”匹配零个或多个字符，“？”除了匹配任何单个字符“”）。请注意，它与完整路径不匹配，仅与单个节点名称不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first occurrence of a substring, ignoring case. Returns the starting position of the substring or -1 if not found. Optionally, the initial search index can be passed.
trans-unit.target: 查找子串的首次出现,忽略大小写。返回子串的起始位置,如果没有找到则返回-1。也可以传递初始搜索索引。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first occurrence of a substring. Returns the starting position of the substring or -1 if not found. Optionally, the initial search index can be passed.
trans-unit.target: 查找子串的第一次出现。如果没有找到,返回子串的起始位置或-1。也可以传递初始搜索索引。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first parent of the current node whose name matches mask as in String.match (i.e. case sensitive, but ‘*’ matches zero or more characters and ‘?’ matches any single character except ‘.’). Note that it does not match against the full path, just against individual node names.
trans-unit.target: 查找当前节点的名字匹配的第一个亲本 mask 作为String.match（即区分大小写，但“*”匹配零个或多个字符，“？”除了匹配任何单个字符“”）。请注意，它与完整路径不匹配，仅与单个节点名称不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Finds the index of an existing value (or the insertion index that maintains sorting order, if the value is not yet present in the array) using binary search and a custom comparison method. Optionally, a before specifier can be passed. If false, the returned index comes after all existing entries of the value in the array. The custom method receives two arguments (an element from the array and the value searched for) and must return true if the first argument is less than the second, and return false otherwise. Note that calling bsearch on an unsorted array results in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用二进制搜索和自定义比较方法查找现有值的索引（如果数组中尚不存在该值，则为保留排序顺序的插入索引）。 （可选）可以传递一个前置说明符。如果为 false ，则返回的索引位于数组中该值的所有现有条目之后。自定义方法接收两个参数（数组中的一个元素和要搜索的值），并且如果第一个参数小于第二个参数，则必须返回 true ，否则返回 false 。请注意，在未排序的数组上调用bsearch会导致意外行为。

trans-unit.source: Finds the index of an existing value (or the insertion index that maintains sorting order, if the value is not yet present in the array) using binary search. Optionally, a before specifier can be passed. If false, the returned index comes after all existing entries of the value in the array. Note that calling bsearch on an unsorted array results in unexpected behavior.

trans-unit.source: For complex arrangements of shapes, it is sometimes needed to add structure to your CSG nodes. The CSGCombiner node allows you to create this structure. The node encapsulates the result of the CSG operations of its children. In this way, it is possible to do operations on one set of shapes that are children of one CSGCombiner node, and a set of separate operations on a second set of shapes that are children of a second CSGCombiner node, and then do an operation that takes the two end results as its input to create the final shape.
trans-unit.target: 对于复杂的形状排列,有时需要为您的CSG节点添加结构。CSGCombiner 节点允许您创建这种结构。该节点封装了其子节点的CSG操作的结果。通过这种方式,我们可以对作为一个CSGCombiner节点的子节点的一组形状进行操作,并对作为第二个CSGCombiner节点的子节点的第二组形状进行一组单独的操作,然后将两个最终结果作为输入来创建最终形状。

Mipmaps are automatically used if the image needs to be scaled down when rendered. This improves image quality and the performance of the rendering. Returns an error if the image is compressed, in a custom format or if the image’s width/height is 0.
trans-unit.target: 生成图像的mipmap。Mipmap是图像的预先计算和较低分辨率的副本。如果在渲染时需要按比例缩小图像，则会自动使用Mipmap。这样可以提高图像质量和渲染性能。如果以自定义格式压缩图像或图像的宽度/高度为0，则返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Given a convex hull defined though the Planes in the array planes, tests if the segment (from, to) intersects with that hull. If an intersection is found, returns a PoolVector3Array containing the point the intersection and the hull’s normal. If no intersecion is found, an the returned array is empty.
trans-unit.target: 鉴于虽然限定的凸包平面在数组S planes ，测试如果段（ from ， to ）与船体相交。如果找到相交点，则返回一个PoolVector3Array，其中包含相交点和船体的法线。如果找不到相交，则返回的数组为空。

trans-unit.source: Given a position within the control return the item (if any) at that point.
trans-unit.target: 给定一个控件内的位置,返回该点的项目(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: Given a set of colors, this node will interpolate them in order, meaning, that if you have color 1, color 2 and color 3, the ramp will interpolate (generate the colors between two colors) from color 1 to color 2 and from color 2 to color 3. Initially the ramp will have 2 colors (black and white), one (black) at ramp lower offset 0 and the other (white) at the ramp higher offset 1.
trans-unit.target: 给定一组颜色,这个节点将按顺序对它们进行插值,也就是说,如果你有颜色1、颜色2和颜色3,斜面将从颜色1到颜色2,再从颜色2到颜色3进行插值(生成两种颜色之间的颜色)。初始时,坡道将有2种颜色(黑色和白色),一种(黑色)在坡道较低偏移量0处,另一种(白色)在坡道较高偏移量1处。

trans-unit.source: Given an array of Vector2s representing tiles, builds an atlas. The returned dictionary has two keys: points is a vector of Vector2 that specifies the positions of each tile, size contains the overall size of the whole atlas as Vector2.
trans-unit.target: 给定表示瓦片的Vector2数组，构建一个地图集。返回的字典有两个键： points 是Vector2的向量，用于指定每个图块的位置， size 包含整个图集的整体大小，即Vector2。

trans-unit.source: Given an array of Vector2s, returns the convex hull as a list of points in counter-clockwise order. The last point is the same as the first one.
trans-unit.target: 给定Vector2的数组，以逆时针顺序将凸包作为点列表返回。最后一点与第一个相同。

trans-unit.source: Given the 2d segment (segment_from, segment_to), returns the position on the segment (as a number between 0 and 1) at which the segment hits the circle that is located at position circle_position and has radius circle_radius. If the segment does not intersect the circle, -1 is returned (this is also the case if the line extending the segment would intersect the circle, but the segment does not).
trans-unit.target: 给定第2个线段（ segment_from ， segment_to ），返回线段在该线段上击中位于位置 circle_position 且半径为 circle_radius 的圆的位置（0到1之间的数字）。如果线段不与圆相交，则返回-1（如果延伸线段的线与圆相交，但线段不相交，情况也是如此）。

trans-unit.source: Given the two 2d segments (p1, p2) and (q1, q2), finds those two points on the two segments that are closest to each other. Returns a PoolVector2Array that contains this point on (p1, p2) as well the accompanying point on (q1, q2).
trans-unit.target: 给定两个2d线段（ p1 ， p2 ）和（ q1 ， q2 ），在两个线段上找到最靠近的两个点。返回一个PoolVector2Array，其中包含（ p1 ， p2 ）上的该点以及（ q1 ， q2 ）上的伴随点。

trans-unit.source: Given the two 3d segments (p1, p2) and (q1, q2), finds those two points on the two segments that are closest to each other. Returns a PoolVector3Array that contains this point on (p1, p2) as well the accompanying point on (q1, q2).
trans-unit.target: 给定两个3d分段（ p1 ， p2 ）和（ q1 ， q2 ），在两个分段上找到彼此最接近的两个点。返回一个PoolVector3Array，其中包含（ p1 ， p2 ）上的该点以及（ q1 ， q2 ）上的伴随点。

trans-unit.source: Godot Engine is an open source project developed by a community of volunteers. The documentation team can always use your feedback and help to improve the tutorials and class reference. If you don’t understand something, or cannot find what you are looking for in the docs, help us make the documentation better by letting us know!
trans-unit.target: Godot Engine是一个由志愿者社区开发的开源项目。文档团队可以随时使用您的反馈，并帮助改进教程和课程参考。如果您不了解某些内容，或者在文档中找不到所需的内容，请告诉我们，以帮助我们更好地编制文档！

trans-unit.source: Godot calls this method to get data that can be dragged and dropped onto controls that expect drop data. Returns null if there is no data to drag. Controls that want to receive drop data should implement can_drop_data and drop_data. position is local to this control. Drag may be forced with force_drag.
trans-unit.target: Godot调用此方法来获取可以拖放到期望放置数据的控件上的数据。如果没有要拖动的数据，则返回null。想要接收放置数据的控件应实现can_drop_data和drop_data。该控件的 position 是本地的。可以使用force_drag强制拖动。

trans-unit.source: Godot calls this method to pass you the data from a control’s get_drag_data result. Godot first calls can_drop_data to test if data is allowed to drop at position where position is local to this control.
trans-unit.target: Godot调用此方法以将控件的get_drag_data结果中的 data 传递给您。戈多首先调用can_drop_data如果测试 data 被允许在下降 position ，其中 position 是本地的这种控制。

trans-unit.source: Godot calls this method to test if data from a control’s get_drag_data can be dropped at position. position is local to this control.
trans-unit.target: Godot调用此方法来测试是否可以将控件的get_drag_data中的 data 放置在 position 处。该控件的 position 是本地的。

trans-unit.target: Godot编辑器的界面。

trans-unit.source: Godot file formats
trans-unit.target: Godot文件格式

trans-unit.source: Godot loads resources in the editor or in exported games using ResourceFormatLoaders. They are queried automatically via the ResourceLoader singleton, or when a resource with internal dependencies is loaded. Each file type may load as a different resource type, so multiple ResourceFormatLoaders are registered in the engine.
trans-unit.target: Godot使用ResourceFormatLoader在编辑器或导出的游戏中加载资源。可以通过ResourceLoader单例自动查询它们，也可以在加载具有内部依赖项的资源时查询它们。每种文件类型都可以作为不同的资源类型加载，因此在引擎中注册了多个ResourceFormatLoader。

trans-unit.source: Godot sends input events to the scene’s root node first, by calling Node._input. Node._input forwards the event down the node tree to the nodes under the mouse cursor, or on keyboard focus. To do so, it calls MainLoop._input_event. Call accept_event so no other node receives the event. Once you accepted an input, it becomes handled so Node._unhandled_input will not process it.
trans-unit.target: Godot首先通过调用Node._input将输入事件发送到场景的根节点。Node._input将事件沿节点树向下转发到鼠标光标下方或键盘焦点上的节点。为此，它将调用MainLoop._input_event。调用accept_event，以便其他任何节点都不会接收到该事件。接受输入后，它将得到处理，因此Node._unhandled_input将不会对其进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Godot uses a message queue to defer some function calls. If you run out of space on it (you will see an error), you can increase the size here.
trans-unit.target: Godot使用消息队列来推迟一些函数调用。如果你用完了它的空间(你会看到一个错误),你可以在这里增加它的大小。

trans-unit.source: Godot uses clockwise winding order for front faces of triangle primitive modes.
trans-unit.target: 戈多采用顺时针方向的绕线顺序,用于三角形基模的前表面。

trans-unit.source: Godot’s documentation is available in various languages and versions. Expand the “Read the Docs” panel at the bottom of the sidebar to see the list.
trans-unit.target: Godot的文档提供多种语言和版本。展开侧栏底部的“阅读文档”面板以查看列表。

trans-unit.source: Grid container will arrange its children in a grid like structure, the grid columns are specified using the columns property and the number of rows will be equal to the number of children in the container divided by the number of columns, for example: if the container has 5 children, and 2 columns, there will be 3 rows in the container. Notice that grid layout will preserve the columns and rows for every size of the container.
trans-unit.target: 网格容器将其子代安排在类似于网格的结构中，使用column属性指定网格列，并且行数等于容器中子代数除以列数，例如：如果容器有5个子项和2列，那么容器中将有3行。请注意，网格布局将保留容器每种尺寸的列和行。

trans-unit.source: Grid size used for real-time capture information on dynamic objects. Cannot be larger than bake_cell_size.

trans-unit.source: Horizontal split container.
trans-unit.target: 水平分割容器。

trans-unit.source: Horizontal split container. See SplitContainer. This goes from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 水平拆分容器。参见SplitContainer。这从左到右。

trans-unit.source: Hotspot for the custom mouse cursor image.
trans-unit.target: 自定义鼠标光标图像的热点。

trans-unit.source: How far to look ahead of the curve to calculate the tangent if the node is rotating. E.g. shorter lookaheads will lead to faster rotations. Default value: 4.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点旋转，则在曲线前看多远以计算切线。例如，较短的前瞻将导致更快的旋转。默认值： 4 。

trans-unit.source: How quickly the ground_horizon_color fades into the ground_bottom_color.
trans-unit.target: 如何迅速ground_horizo​​n_color变淡到ground_bottom_color。

trans-unit.source: How quickly the sky_horizon_color fades into the sky_top_color.
trans-unit.target: 如何迅速sky_horizo​​n_color变淡到sky_top_color。

trans-unit.source: How quickly the camera moves toward its target. Higher values will result in tighter camera motion.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机向目标移动的速度。数值越高,摄像机的运动就越紧凑。

trans-unit.source: How quickly the sun fades away between sun_angle_min and sun_angle_max.
trans-unit.target: 太阳在sun_angle_min和sun_angle_max之间褪色的速度有多快。

trans-unit.source: How rapidly particles in an emission cycle are emitted. If greater than 0, there will be a gap in emissions before the next cycle begins. Default value: 0.
trans-unit.target: 粒子在一个发射周期中发射的速度。如果大于 0 ，则在下一个周期开始之前会有排放量缺口。默认值： 0 。

trans-unit.source: However, by creating a FuncRef using the @GDScript.funcref function, a reference to a function in a given object can be created, passed around and called.
trans-unit.target: 但是，通过使用@ GDScript.funcref函数创建 FuncRef ，可以在给定对象中创建，传递和调用对该函数的引用。

trans-unit.source: Hue variation randomness ratio. Default value: 0.
trans-unit.target: 色相变化随机率。默认值： 0 。

trans-unit.source: Hyper-text transfer protocol client (sometimes called “User Agent”). Used to make HTTP requests to download web content, upload files and other data or to communicate with various services, among other use cases.
trans-unit.target: 超文本传输​​协议客户端（有时称为“用户代理”）。除其他用例外，用于发出HTTP请求以下载Web内容，上传文件和其他数据或与各种服务进行通信。
